official.headline: City Tribunal Begins
official.anchor_line: The Council launches a citywide tribunal investigating the Behavioral Compliance Index—Stenograd's real-time resident scoring system.
official.contextual_reframing: Transparent review ensures public trust in our advanced governance tools and ongoing civic stability.

official.headline: Whistleblower Testimony Heard
official.anchor_line: Key witness Oksana Lintz shares evidence of wrongly applied sanctions under the BCI at today's public hearing.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd remains committed to accuracy and fair treatment for all citizens in system operations.

official.headline: Reparations Announced
official.anchor_line: The tribunal promises partial reparations for residents affected by BCI errors, reinforcing redress and recovery.
official.contextual_reframing: The Council's swift action exemplifies adaptive, self-correcting governance aligned with technocratic values.

underground.headline: BCI On Trial
underground.anchor_line: Council tries to fix the Behavioral Compliance Index mess—only after public outrage boiled over.
underground.contextual_reframing: The BCI system tracks every move and scores us all. Now the cracks are too big to hide. Tribunal isn’t justice—it's damage control.

underground.headline: Whistleblower Unmasked
underground.anchor_line: Oksana Lintz steps up, but faces the tribunal’s glare for exposing wrongful BCI punishments.
underground.contextual_reframing: She risked everything to say the obvious: the system is broken by design. But heroes here get blamed while officials wash their hands.

underground.headline: Empty Promises Again
underground.anchor_line: Leaders promise reparations for BCI victims—no dates, no details, just headlines.
underground.contextual_reframing: We’ve seen these scripted gestures before. Council covers itself, but justice for the flagged and silenced rarely comes. Don’t let them decide when ‘enough’ is enough.
